Empowering Uganda's Creators

9Yards Gear is a division of 9Yards Film, dedicated to providing professional film equipment to Uganda's growing creative community. We believe great stories deserve great tools.

Explore Our Equipment

Our Story

9Yards Film started as a passion project by Ugandan filmmakers who understood the challenges of accessing quality equipment for local productions. We've since grown into one of Uganda's leading production houses.

9Yards Gear was born from our desire to share our professional equipment with the broader creative community. Whether you're shooting a music video, documentary, commercial, or feature film, we have the gear you need.

We're not just a rental house â€“ we're filmmakers who understand your needs. Our team can help you choose the right equipment for your project and provide technical support when you need it.

Why Choose Us

We're committed to supporting your creative vision with reliable equipment and exceptional service.

Quality Guaranteed

Every piece of equipment is professionally maintained and tested before each rental.

Always Available

Flexible rental periods and quick turnaround to meet your production schedule.

Professional Grade

Access to cinema-quality cameras, lenses, and accessories used in top productions.

Expert Support

Our team of experienced filmmakers is here to help you choose the right gear.

Rental Terms

Please review our rental policies before booking. Contact us if you have any questions.

Booking Process

Submit a booking request through our website or contact us directly. We'll confirm availability within 24 hours and provide payment instructions. A 50% deposit is required to secure your booking.

Pickup & Return

Equipment pickup is available from our Kampala location during business hours. Return equipment by 6 PM on your rental end date. Late returns incur additional day charges.

Identification Requirements

Valid government-issued ID and proof of address are required for all rentals. Corporate clients may provide company registration documents instead.

Damage & Insurance

Renters are responsible for equipment during the rental period. Optional insurance coverage is available at 10% of rental value. Report any damage immediately upon return.

Cancellation Policy

Cancel 48+ hours before pickup for a full refund. Cancellations within 48 hours forfeit 25% of the rental fee. No-shows forfeit the full deposit.

Payment Methods

We accept Mobile Money (MTN, Airtel), bank transfers, and cash. International clients can pay via Flutterwave. Full payment required before pickup.

Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about our rental services.
